thread.title: OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next?
thread.title_full: OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next?

title: OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next?
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
We all know that Shahrukh Khan is busy shooting for Dilwale starring opposite Kajol , Varun Dhawan and Kriti Sanon . Little did we know that Shahrukh Khan has signed an exciting deal with Southern star Tamannaah Bhatia .Yes, Shahrukh Khan and Tamannaah Bhatia have come together for a project and have already completed the shoot. Tamannaah even tweeted a picture along with SRK. Confused? Dont be.SRK and Tamannaah are not doing a movie, instead they are together for an advertisement. The Humshakals actress was super excited about collaborating with the Baadshah of Bollywood and took to Twitter to share her happiness, she tweeted as,"My fan moment @iamsrk you are a total inspiration such a pleasure working with you @Yepmedotcom"Shahrukh Khan has been endorsing an online shopping website for quite some years now and Tamannaah Bhatia has joined the online portals advertising space. 
Apart from shooting for Dilwale , SRK is also working on Raees , Fan and Gauri Shinde's next starring opposite Alia Bhatt . OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next? 1/11 Shahrukh Khan And Tamannaah Bhatia 
SRK and Tamannaah are not doing a movie, instead they are together for an advertisement. OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next? 2/11 Tweet Tweet 
"My fan moment @iamsrk you are a total inspiration such a pleasure working with you @Yepmedotcom" tweeted Tamannaah Bhatia. OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next? 3/11 
Tamannaah Bhatia also posted collage pictures of her photoshoot for HelloMag India. OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next? 4/11 Shahrukh Khan's Tweet 
Shahrukh Khan recently posted a beautiful black and white picture on Twitter along with Kajol for Dilwale. OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next? 5/11 SRK's Tweets 
"Film toh joh kamaal banayega woh toh banayega Rohit. Abhi usne joh photo lee hai woh dekh lo. #Dilwale" Tweeted Shahrukh Khan. OMG! Shahrukh Khan To Star Opposite Tamannaah Bhatia In Next? 6/11
